com.jgefroh.core

Class AbstractSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jgefroh.core.AbstractSystem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ISystem

    public abstract class AbstractSystem
extends java.lang.Object
implements ISystem
    An abstract system that provides basic functionality.

    Extend this System to make it easier to write Systems.

    Author:
    Joseph Gefroh
